author: senh
title: Cycling vacation offers guilt-free gluttony
text: BING NEWS: Cycling vacation offers guilt-free gluttony (CNN)I imagine that people travel for all sorts of reasons. Me, I like to travel to relax and eat. Basically both in as much quantity as possible. Those are my top two priorities, especially when going anywhere without my 6-year-old.
